meta.name: description
meta.value: Dialog about a spoken payment message

parameter.name: paymentType
parameter.description: The type of the payment represented as an enum.

parameter.name: componentCount
parameter.description: The number of payment items represented by this component.

parameter.name: componentContext
parameter.description: Context used for dialoging about given message component

parameter.name: spokenContext
parameter.description: Spoken messages context used for dialoging.
